sourcesContent:
import React,{useContext,useEffect} from 'react' import '../styles/BookingSummary.css' import flightContent from "../context/FlightContext"; const BookingSummary = () => { const content = useContext(flightContent) const {selectedflight, adultCounter, childCounter,infantCounter ,passCount,localpassengers} = content useEffect(() => { console.log(localpassengers) }, []) return (
Trip Summary
Your trip summary
{selectedflight.map((flight)=>{ return
Outbound flight
{flight.departuredate}
{flight.arrivaldate}
{flight.departuretime}
{flight.from}
{flight.arrivaltime}
{flight.to}
Opearted by {flight.flightname}
Total trip price:
{adultCounter?<>{adultCounter} Adult:''}{childCounter?<>+{childCounter}Child:''}{infantCounter?<>+{infantCounter}Infant:''}
{passCount*flight.price}
})}
{localpassengers.map((element)=>{ return
{element.firstname+element.lastname}
})}
) } export default BookingSummary
